events.name: France Unveils National Ecological Plan
events.wd_description: President Emmanuel Macron revealed a national ecological plan aimed at reducing France’s greenhouse gas emissions by 55% and ending the use of fossil fuels by 2030.
events.description: President Emmanuel Macron revealed a national ecological plan aimed at reducing France’s greenhouse gas emissions by 55% and ending the use of fossil fuels by 2030.

events.name: Announcement by President Macron
events.wd_description: President Emmanuel Macron announced the ecological plan after a special ministerial council at the Elysee.
events.description: President Emmanuel Macron announced the ecological plan after a special ministerial council at the Elysee.

events.name: Key Measures of the Plan
events.wd_description: The plan includes measures such as speeding up the production of electric cars, brakes on gas boilers, new offshore wind farm projects, and opening several electric battery factories in northern France.
events.description: The plan includes measures such as speeding up the production of electric cars, brakes on gas boilers, new offshore wind farm projects, and opening several electric battery factories in northern France.

events.name: Investment and Funding
events.wd_description: An additional €10bn will be spent to execute the 50-point ecological program.
events.description: An additional €10bn will be spent to execute the 50-point ecological program.

events.name: Industrial Pollution Reduction Agreement
events.wd_description: Companies responsible for 50 of the dirtiest industrial sites in France are expected to sign an agreement to reduce pollution by 45% before the end of 2030.
events.description: Companies responsible for 50 of the dirtiest industrial sites in France are expected to sign an agreement to reduce pollution by 45% before the end of 2030.

events.name: Control of Electricity Prices
events.wd_description: Full control of electricity prices will return to the state by next month, as part of the plan.
events.description: Full control of electricity prices will return to the state by next month, as part of the plan.

events.name: South Korea Increases Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
events.wd_label: South Korea Increases Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
events.wd_description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol has promised to increase humanitarian and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine following a summit with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.
events.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol has promised to increase humanitarian and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine following a summit with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.

events.name: Humanitarian Aid Commitment
events.wd_description: South Korea will increase its humanitarian aid to Ukraine to $150 million in 2023.
events.description: South Korea will increase its humanitarian aid to Ukraine to $150 million in 2023.

events.name: Non-Lethal Military Assistance
events.wd_description: South Korea will provide additional non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, including vehicles and demining equipment.
events.description: South Korea will provide additional non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, including vehicles and demining equipment.

events.name: Visit to Ukraine
events.wd_description: President Yoon Suk-Yeol and his wife, Kim Keon-Hee, visited Ukraine after attending the NATO summit in Lithuania, marking Yoon's first visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion.
events.description: President Yoon Suk-Yeol and his wife, Kim Keon-Hee, visited Ukraine after attending the NATO summit in Lithuania, marking Yoon's first visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion.

events.name: South Korea's Policy on Lethal Weapons
events.wd_label: South Korea's Policy on Lethal Weapons
events.wd_description: South Korea maintains a policy of not supplying lethal weapons to active conflict zones, despite being the world’s ninth-largest arms exporter.
events.description: South Korea maintains a policy of not supplying lethal weapons to active conflict zones, despite being the world’s ninth-largest arms exporter.

events.name: China's Economic Expansion in Q2 2023
events.wd_description: China's economy expanded by 6.3% in the second quarter of 2023 compared to the previous year, driven by a low base from last year's COVID-19 lockdowns.
events.description: China's economy expanded by 6.3% in the second quarter of 2023 compared to the previous year, driven by a low base from last year's COVID-19 lockdowns.

events.name: GDP Growth
events.wd_description: China's gross domestic product grew by 6.3% year-on-year in Q2 2023, with a quarterly growth of 0.8% from April to June.
events.description: China's gross domestic product grew by 6.3% year-on-year in Q2 2023, with a quarterly growth of 0.8% from April to June.

events.name: Industrial Output Increase
events.wd_description: In June, China's industrial output expanded by 4.4%.
events.description: In June, China's industrial output expanded by 4.4%.

events.name: Fixed Asset Investment Rise
events.wd_description: Fixed asset investment in China rose by 3.8% in June.
events.description: Fixed asset investment in China rose by 3.8% in June.

events.name: Record High Youth Unemployment
events.wd_description: The jobless rate for Chinese youth aged 16 to 24 reached a new record high of 21.34% in June, surpassing the previous record of 20.8% set in May.
events.description: The jobless rate for Chinese youth aged 16 to 24 reached a new record high of 21.34% in June, surpassing the previous record of 20.8% set in May.

events.name: EV Battery Recycling Investments
events.wd_description: Automakers and companies are increasing investments in EV battery recycling to reduce reliance on critical raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, and nickel.
events.description: Automakers and companies are increasing investments in EV battery recycling to reduce reliance on critical raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, and nickel.

events.name: Redwood Materials Funding
events.wd_description: Redwood Materials received a $2 billion loan commitment from the Department of Energy to expand its battery materials recycling capacity.
events.description: Redwood Materials received a $2 billion loan commitment from the Department of Energy to expand its battery materials recycling capacity.

events.name: Industry Partnerships
events.wd_description: Ford and Volvo have signed an agreement with Redwood Materials to recycle end-of-life battery packs from hybrid and electric vehicles in California.
events.description: Ford and Volvo have signed an agreement with Redwood Materials to recycle end-of-life battery packs from hybrid and electric vehicles in California.

events.name: Impact on Material Costs
events.wd_description: Recycling efforts could reduce the costs of producing new batteries, which was roughly $153/kWh in 2022, by recovering critical raw materials from end-of-life EV batteries.
events.description: Recycling efforts could reduce the costs of producing new batteries, which was roughly $153/kWh in 2022, by recovering critical raw materials from end-of-life EV batteries.

events.name: Recycling Efficiency
events.wd_description: Redwood Materials can recover roughly 95% of nickel, cobalt, lithium, and copper from end-of-life EV batteries, which can be used to manufacture cathode and anode materials for new batteries.
events.description: Redwood Materials can recover roughly 95% of nickel, cobalt, lithium, and copper from end-of-life EV batteries, which can be used to manufacture cathode and anode materials for new batteries.

events.name: Redwood Materials' Circular Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Redwood Materials aims to create a circular supply chain in the U.S. by recovering critical raw materials from electric vehicle batteries at their end-of-life.
events.description: Redwood Materials aims to create a circular supply chain in the U.S. by recovering critical raw materials from electric vehicle batteries at their end-of-life.

events.name: Material Recovery Efficiency
events.wd_description: Redwood says it can recover approximately 95% of nickel, cobalt, lithium, and copper from end-of-life EV batteries.
events.description: Redwood says it can recover approximately 95% of nickel, cobalt, lithium, and copper from end-of-life EV batteries.

events.name: Future Production Goals
events.wd_description: Redwood aims to produce 100 GWh of cathode and anode components per year by 2025, with a target of 500 GWh a year by 2030.
events.description: Redwood aims to produce 100 GWh of cathode and anode components per year by 2025, with a target of 500 GWh a year by 2030.

events.name: Strategic Partnerships
events.wd_description: Tesla’s battery supplier, Panasonic, plans to use recycled cathode materials supplied by Redwood to produce batteries at its new factory in Kansas starting in 2025.
events.description: Tesla’s battery supplier, Panasonic, plans to use recycled cathode materials supplied by Redwood to produce batteries at its new factory in Kansas starting in 2025.

events.name: Economic Impact of Domestic Production
events.wd_description: Without sufficient U.S. production of cathode and anode materials, domestic battery cell manufacturers may offshore over $150 billion in economic value by 2030.
events.description: Without sufficient U.S. production of cathode and anode materials, domestic battery cell manufacturers may offshore over $150 billion in economic value by 2030.

events.name: Loss of Economic Value
events.wd_description: Domestic battery cell manufacturers risk offshoring over $150 billion in economic value for anode and cathode components by 2030 without sufficient U.S. production.
events.description: Domestic battery cell manufacturers risk offshoring over $150 billion in economic value for anode and cathode components by 2030 without sufficient U.S. production.

events.name: Importance of Domestic Production
events.wd_description: Increasing domestic production of cathode and anode materials is crucial for maintaining economic value and reducing reliance on foreign supply chains.
events.description: Increasing domestic production of cathode and anode materials is crucial for maintaining economic value and reducing reliance on foreign supply chains.
